RequestCode.description: Request code to identify which service is being used

currId_CurrencyType.title: currId_CurrencyType

CurrCode.description: Numeric ISO code identifying the currency

AlphaCode.description: ISO Alpha Code identifying the currency

currId_CurrencyType.description: Identifier for a currency. Can be either the ISO numeric code or ISO Alpha Code

sch2_ActionCode.title: sch2_ActionCode
sch2_ActionCode.description: Action code identifying the result of a transaction.

sch2_YesNoFlag.title: sch2_YesNoFlag
sch2_YesNoFlag.description: Flag indicating if a specific option is enabled or disabled

sch2_AdditionalFieldsType.title: sch2_AdditionalFieldsType

AdditionalField.description: Additional fields to be used in the request instead of adding on each time new field in the request

sch2_AdditionalFieldsType.description: List additional fields requested for the application

Value.description: Value to be set for the field. In case not returned or empty, it means the field value is not set

sch2_Money.title: sch2_Money
sch2_Money.description: Any amounts used in the webservices use the money type which is the combination of the amount and currency. To get the list of supported ISO currency codes, use the GetCurrencyList service

sch2_MoneyOptionalAmount.title: sch2_MoneyOptionalAmount
sch2_MoneyOptionalAmount.description: Same as money but with the amount as optional. Used in cases where the currency is required but the amount is optional

sch2_CtxLocaleDescrList.title: sch2_CtxLocaleDescrList
sch2_CtxLocaleDescrList.description: List of Locale descriptions defined cortex for a specific element

sch2_CtxLocaleDescrType.title: sch2_CtxLocaleDescrType
sch2_CtxLocaleDescrType.description: Locale description having the defined cortex locale, description and short description

sch2_DescriptionList.title: sch2_DescriptionList
sch2_DescriptionList.description: List of all description values available for a specific entity

sch2_PageSetupType.title: sch2_PageSetupType

PageSize.description: Number of results supported in a single page

PageNumber.description: The requested page number starting with 1 for the first page. If not specified, it will be defaulted to 1

ReturnCount.description: Specifies if the count and page details are required in the response. If set to true, the PagingDetails tag will be returned in the response holding the total number of results, current number of results in the requested page, current page number and total page number. If not specified, defaults to true. This tag is introduced to enhance performance and response time in case the total count is not really required

sch2_PageSetupType.description: Page setup required (number of records per page and the page number required)

sch2_PagingDetailsType.title: sch2_PagingDetailsType

PageSize.description: Number of results supported in a single page. Echoed back from the request

TotalNumberOfResults.description: Total number of results for the request

CurrentNumberOfResults.description: Current of number of results returned in the response

TotalNumberOfPages.description: Total number of pages for the all results satisfying the critieria of the request

CurrentPageNumber.description: Current page number for the results

sch2_PagingDetailsType.description: Details of the paging returned in the response

sch2_TransactionTypeListType.title: sch2_TransactionTypeListType

TransactionType.description: Start tag for the list of individual denied transaction types

sch2_TransactionTypeListType.description: A list of services (transaction types) defined and used in Cortex

sch2_BatchClassType.title: sch2_BatchClassType
sch2_BatchClassType.description: Value indicating if a card batch is instant or bulk...

sch2_AccountDerivationMethod.title: sch2_AccountDerivationMethod
sch2_AccountDerivationMethod.description: Used for requests where the account is not specified but the card is and the processing requires an account to be selected. It defines how the account will be selected based on the card specified

sch2_AmountRangeType.title: sch2_AmountRangeType

AmountFrom.description: Lower amount value for the range

AmountTo.description: Higher amount value for the range

sch2_AmountRangeType.description: Range of amount (low/high) mainly used for inquiry services. Both amount from and to can be specified or only one of them.

sch2_CreditTransactionAction.title: sch2_CreditTransactionAction
sch2_CreditTransactionAction.description: Action for a new credit transaction. Defaulted to C - Create only if not specified

sch2_MessageClassType.title: sch2_MessageClassType
sch2_MessageClassType.description: Identifies if the transaction is an authorization transaction, financial, reversal..

sch2_DateRangeType.title: sch2_DateRangeType

DateFrom.description: From date value for the range

DateTo.description: to date value for the range

sch2_DateRangeType.description: Range of dates mainly used for inquiry services. Both dates from and to can be specified or only one of them. (depending on the service)

sch2_TimeRangeType.title: sch2_TimeRangeType

TimeFrom.description: From Time value for the range

TimeTo.description: To Time value for the range

sch2_TimeRangeType.description: Range of times mainly used for inquiry services. Both time from and to can be specified or only one of them (depending on the service)

sch2_CreditDebitType.title: sch2_CreditDebitType
sch2_CreditDebitType.description: This flag indicates if the transaction is a credit or debit one. In some cases where the transaction is suspended or not yet posted, the value will be U - Undefined

sch2_ItemCategoryType.title: sch2_ItemCategoryType

allOf.description: Locale descriptions in case configured for the item category

sch2_ItemCategoryType.description: Used to categorize the transaction. The values are customer specific

DateLocalAsc.description: Specifies that the transactions should be ordered by local date ascending (oldest to newest). Should be skipped in case date local desc is specified

DateLocalDesc.description: Specifies that the transactions should be ordered by local date descending (newest to oldest). Should be skipped in case date local asc is specified

TimeLocalAsc.description: Specifies that the transactions should be ordered by local time ascending (oldest to newest). Should be skipped in case time local desc is specified

TimeLocalDesc.description: Specifies that the transactions should be ordered by local time descending (newest to oldest). Should be skipped in case time local asc is specified

PostingDateAsc.description: Specifies that the transactions should be ordered by posting date ascending (oldest to newest). Should be skipped in case posting date desc is specified

PostingDateDesc.description: Specifies that the transactions should be ordered by the posting date descending (newest to oldest). Should be skipped in case posting date asc is specified

TransactionAmountAsc.description: Specifies that the transactions should be ordered by the transaction amount ascending (smallest to largest). Should be skipped in case transaction amount desc is specified

TransactionAmountDesc.description: Specifies that the transactions should be ordered by the transaction amount descending (largest to smallest). Should be skipped in case transaction amount asc is specified

BillingAmountAsc.description: Specifies that the transactions should be ordered by the billing amount ascending (smallest to largest). Should be skipped in case billing amount desc is specified

BillingAmountDesc.description: Specifies that the transactions should be ordered by the billing amount descending (largest to smallest). Should be skipped in case billing amount asc is specified

sch2_PinTypeType.title: sch2_PinTypeType
sch2_PinTypeType.description: Specifies the type of the pin. As multiple pins are supported by Cortex, this will identify the usage of the pin

sch2_CreditItemApplicationRuleType.title: sch2_CreditItemApplicationRuleType
sch2_CreditItemApplicationRuleType.description: Specifies if the transaction was applied on the due balance or not due balance of the credit account

sch2_PaymentPlanFeeBasisType.title: sch2_PaymentPlanFeeBasisType
sch2_PaymentPlanFeeBasisType.description: Indicates the basis of the calculation of the fees for a payment plan

sch2_PaymentPlanInterestCalculationMetho.title: sch2_PaymentPlanInterestCalculationMethodType
sch2_PaymentPlanInterestCalculationMetho.description: Specifies how the rate amount is applied and how the fee is calculated on a payment plan

sch2_PaymentPlanFixedAmountCalculationMe.title: sch2_PaymentPlanFixedAmountCalculationMethodType
sch2_PaymentPlanFixedAmountCalculationMe.description: Specifies how the fixed amount fee is applied

sch2_PaymentPlanRemainingFeeActionType.title: sch2_PaymentPlanRemainingFeeActionType
sch2_PaymentPlanRemainingFeeActionType.description: Specifies what will happen with the remaining fee when the plan is prematurely canceled or closed

sch2_PaymentPlanFeeRateDetailsType.title: sch2_PaymentPlanFeeRateDetailsType

allOf.description: Specifies how the payment plan interest rate is calculated

InterestRate.description: Interest rate % on the amount of the payment plan. It determines the interest added to the payment plan amount based on the rate divisor and the interest rate calculation method. For example if the amount of the transaction is 1000 and the rate is 5% with a rate divisor as I (Every Installment) and the rate calculation method is 2, the interest amount will be 50 each month and the total amount of the plan will become 10000 + (50 x number of installments).

allOf.description: Specifies what will be done with the remaining interest if the plan is canceled
Specifies what will be done with the remaining interest if the plan is fully paid before the expected end date

TotalFeeRateAmount.description: Total fee rate amount. If no other details are set, it means the fee is taken up-front and not on each installment

SingleInstallmentRateFeeAmount.description: Fee rate amount applicable on every installment. Only available in case the calculation method specifies rate on full plan amount

LastInstallmentRateFeeAmount.description: Fee rate amount applicable on the last installment. Only available in case the calculation method specifies rate on full plan amount

allOf.description: Holds the rate applicable on each installment which will be different. Only available in case the calculation method specifies rate on outstanding plan amount

sch2_PaymentPlanFeeRateDetailsType.description: Details of the rate based fee applicable on the payment plan

sch2_InstallmentsRateFeeDetailsType.title: sch2_InstallmentsRateFeeDetailsType
sch2_InstallmentsRateFeeDetailsType.description: Details of the rate fee applicable on each installment

sch2_InstallmentsRateFeeType.title: sch2_InstallmentsRateFeeType

InstallmentNumber.description: Installment number this fee applies on

FeeRateAmount.description: Applicable rate amount for this installment

OutstandingBalance.description: Outstanding balance the rate applied on to get the fee rate amount

sch2_InstallmentsRateFeeType.description: Details of the rate applicable on an individual installment

sch2_PaymentPlanFixedFeeDetailsType.title: sch2_PaymentPlanFixedFeeDetailsType

allOf.description: Specifies how the payment plan fixed amount fee is applied

FixedAmount.description: Configured fixed amount. The calculation depends on the fixed amount basis. i.e. if the basis is I (on every installment) and the fixed amount is 10, a fixed fee of 10 is applied on every installment

allOf.description: Specifies what will be done with the remaining fee if the plan is canceled
Specifies what will be done with the remaining fee if the plan is fully paid before the expected end date

TotalFixedFeeAmount.description: Total fixed amount fee. If no other details are set, it means the fee is taken up-front and not on each installment

SingleInstallmentFixedFeeAmount.description: Fixed fee amount applicable on every installment.

LastInstallmentFixedFeeAmount.description: Fixed fee amount applicable on the last installment.

sch2_PaymentPlanFixedFeeDetailsType.description: Fixed fee amount applicable on a payment plan.

sch2_CardAuthorizationParametersType.title: sch2_CardAuthorizationParametersType
sch2_CardAuthorizationParametersType.description: Flags on card level for card specific rules and rejections. Each position will have a usage which is customer specific. Refer to the implementation team for customer specific usage

Position.description: Position of the card authorization parameters. Up to 32 positions are supported

sch2_NewCcsItemExternalAccountActionType.title: sch2_NewCcsItemExternalAccountActionType
sch2_NewCcsItemExternalAccountActionType.description: Specifies the action to be done with the external account details for new CCS Item requests

sch2_CycleBaseType.title: sch2_CycleBaseType
sch2_CycleBaseType.description: Identifies the cycle base used to calculate a cycle

sch2_CycleStartType.title: sch2_CycleStartType
sch2_CycleStartType.description: Identifies how a cycle start is determined

Tag.description: Tag for the customer specific user data

User.description: User name requesting the service. This will be validated and if not configured or not allowed for this service, the request will be rejected

Password.description: Password of the user requesting the service. This will be validated and if incorrect, the request will be rejected

allOf.description: Specifies the version of the header used. Current supported values are 1.0.0. Echoed back in the response header

MsgUid.description: Unique message ID identifying a specific message. Echoed back in the response header

Source.description: Source of the request. Echoed back in the response header

ServiceId.description: Service Id of the service being called. Echoed back in the response header.

ReqDateTime.description: Request Date and Time echoed back in the response in the format yyyy-MM-dd-HH:mm:ss.SSS

Locale.description: Locale required for the localized response message. In case not specified, the localized response message will not be returned in the response. In case specified but invalid or no localized messages are setup for this locale message, the default English message will be returned in the localized response message

allOf.description: Security holding the user and password of the requester of the service. Only mandatory in case the security is enabled for the services

Header user data for customer specific usage. This field will be echoed back as is in the response if present, mainly used for fields from the request that might be needed in the response for the customer's internal usage. No validation is done on these fields. In some rare cases, these can hold customer specific tags
Specifies the version of the header used. Current supported values are 1.0.0. Echoed back from the request header

MsgUid.description: Unique message ID identifying a specific message. Echoed back from the request header

Source.description: Source of the request. Echoed back from the request header

ServiceId.description: Service Id of the service called. Echoed back from the request header

ReqDateTime.description: Request Date and Time echoed back from the request

RspDateTime.description: Response Date and Time in the format yyyy-MM-dd-HH:mm:ss.SSS

ResponseCode.description: Response code of the request processing. This value is unique for each error. A response code of 000 indicates a successful operation. Any other response code indicates an error. The value 999 indicates an unknown system error

ResponseType.description: Indicates the type of the response code. Supported values are - Validation Error: Returned when invalid elements are received in the request - Business Error: Indicates a business logic error (i.e. request operation on a card that does not exist) - System Error: Indicates a system error (i.e. Database Error) - Success: Indicates a successful request

ProcessingTime.description: Time taken by the web-service to do the processing and reply in milli seconds

ResponseDescription.description: Description of the request result and the response code. Gives additional details about the result of the operation

allOf.description: Only returned when a locale is specified in the request.
List of customer specific response description in case configured

Header user data for customer specific usage. This field will be echoed back as is in the response if present, mainly used for fields from the request that might be needed in the response for the customer's internal usage. No validation is done on these fields. In some rare cases, these can hold customer specific tags

Locale.description: Locale echoed back from the request regardless if it was valid or not

LocalizedDescription.description: Localized description of the response. In case the locale specified is invalid or the no localized messages are defined for the locale specified, this will hold the same value as the ResponseDescription

CustomerSpecificResponseDescription.description: Customer specific descriptions in case configured

Locale.description: Locale for the message returned under this tag

ResponseDescription.description: Customer specific response description in the locale specified under this tag
